modified_SQL_query: CREATE VIEW TOP_CUSTOMERS AS SELECT C.CustomerName , SUM(PH.Qty) FROM dbo.Customer as C, dbo.Purchase AS PH WHERE NOT EXISTS( subquery1_1 ) AND C.CustomerId = PH.CustomerId GROUP BY C.CustomerName HAVING SUM(PH.Qty) > 50

subquery_dictionary.subquery1_1: SELECT * FROM dbo.Product as P WHERE NOT EXISTS ( subquery2_1 )
subquery_dictionary.subquery2_1: SELECT * FROM dbo.Purchase as PU WHERE PU.CustomerID = C.CustomerID AND PU.ProductID = P.ProductId
